name: Accidental Kaiju
description:
What if you and your friends spontaneously spawned in a giant robot kaiju each with control of different parts of the bot? How does it work? Could you control it? Could you defend yourself?

Accidental Kaiju answers these questions in the jankiest of game jam fashion. 

Grab a flight stick with a throttle and an xbox controller and a few friends to see what happens.
